name: Carmen Belmonte
coverLetter:
Dear friends, 
I have more than 4 for years experience into the cannabis environment and enjoying the trimming in itself where I can get very decent numbers per journey, let's say 4 hours to get a pound +- or around 120 grams per hour in good conditions. 
I have been working in the outdoor season in NorCal along 5 years helping with harvest, pruning, bucking etc and same in the Bay Area as Trimmer, Trainer and Team Supervisor, Packaging and Delivery service among others
In the present, I'm working where I'm the Team Lead Manager having under my supervision a crew of 15 trimmers between my responsibilities, but looking to moving forward.
I consider myself very detail oriented, can work under pressure, honest, I can work independently or as a part of a team.
I could provide references in case you need them also, I have the Cannabis Medical Card, California driver's license, car + insurance, and clean records and personal background.
I am confident that my abilities and passion for this environment make me a successful partner to support your collective and be a part of it
I welcome the opportunity to meet with you further to discuss my candidacy and qualifications. 
Thank you for your time and consideration.
